title: WTF happened to movement speed.. #5.22
body:
bring back Zephyr
or is there anything in the shop that compares to it??

replies.body: rapid firecannon....... all i can say is 8% with crits and attack speed with bonus range
Its not like anyone cared about Zephyr anyway.

sorry but movement speed, attack damage, cooldown reduction, and +50% attack speed

need i say more.....

Movement speed you couldve gotten from boots? meager attack damage that you could've gotten more of from any other item in the game? A small amount of cooldown reduction you could get from any other item in the game and 50% attack speed that you could have gotten from more useful items? Face it, Zephyr was OK but it was never good, at best it was only good for the tenacity, but if you buy Zephyr for Tenacity then you're better off with Mercs, theres nothing Zephyr can do that another item can do better.

yeah i could buy boots and get a bit of speed but ill still have to waist at least 2 more spaces buying top level items for double the price, that still wont give as much as zephyr does.. yep good one mate
Ok ill speak to you when youve had a chance to calm down.

> [{quoted}](name=FioraTheExplorer,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=VJ8H5O0y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-12T04:07:09.109+0000)
>
> Its not like anyone cared about Zephyr anyway.

I do,I play udyr and i use it alot
